TABLE.NAME: nudge
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores instances of Nudge that indicate and provide metadata for Courses who want Nudge reminders

FIELD.NAME: courseid
FIELD.COMMENT: Course that this nudge instance is linked to

FIELD.NAME: linkedlearnernotificationid
FIELD.COMMENT: The has one for a nudge_notification that will be sent to the Learner on nudge trigger.

FIELD.NAME: linkedmanagernotificationid
FIELD.COMMENT: The has one for a nudge_notification that will be sent to the Manager on nudge trigger.

FIELD.NAME: isenabled
FIELD.COMMENT: Indicates that this nudge instance is enabled and ready to send messages.

FIELD.NAME: lastmodified
FIELD.COMMENT: The last time this Nudge instance was modified

FIELD.NAME: reminderrecipient
FIELD.COMMENT: The Reminder Recipient field indicates who should receive reminders from this Nudge instance.

FIELD.NAME: remindertype
FIELD.COMMENT: Enum representing this nudge's method of determining the appropriate date to remind on

KEY.NAME: linkedlearnernotificationkey
KEY.COMMENT: Foreign key constraint for a nudge_notification for the learner.

KEY.NAME: linkedmanagernotificationkey
KEY.COMMENT: Foreign key constraint for a nudge_notification for the manager.

TABLE.NAME: nudge_notification
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores instances of a Nudge Notification linked via the nudge_nudge_notification many many through table.

FIELD.NAME: lastmodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp this entity was last modified at.

FIELD.NAME: userfromid
FIELD.COMMENT: A has one to an instance of user that this notification can be sent from. Will use core's no-reply user if null.

KEY.NAME: userfromkey
KEY.COMMENT: Foreign key constraint for has one to user.

TABLE.NAME: nudge_notification_content
TABLE.COMMENT: One nudge_notification can have many nudge_notification_content so that multiple languages can be supported for a single template.

FIELD.NAME: body
FIELD.COMMENT: Body content for this nudge notification

TABLE.NAME: nudge_user
TABLE.COMMENT: This table joins between a nudge instance and a user to keep track of the recurrence time.

FIELD.NAME: recurrancetime
FIELD.COMMENT: Used to track individual enrollments for recurring notifications.
